title: Happy Birthday, Rina-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>Rina-chan, happy birthday zura~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Thank you.... Hanamaru-chan. Rina-chan’s board「Shy」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>So actually, Maru also tried to make a Maru-chan’s board, can you take a look at it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Rina-chan’s board is really cute, so Maru wanted to copy it and made one with everyone from Aqours and μ’s. Let’s have everyone use one at today’s birthday party<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Everyone did? That’s.... amazing. Rina-chan’s board「Excited」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Yaaay! Thank you! Ehehe, then.... Maru-chan’s board「Excited」. How was it? Did Maru do it well?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Yeah.... it was great. You’re really good at drawing.... Hanamaru-chan. Your feelings reached me<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Ehehe~. We also prepared cake and cookies that look like Rina-chan’s board, so look forward to it! Also, Yoshiko-chan’s Yohane-chan’s board is Aqours’ secret weapon, so expect to be surprised!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Secret weapon.... Then I.... can’t lose. Hold on.... I’ll.... draw a Rina-chan’s board that.... will be my secret weapon. Rina-chan’s board「Pumped up」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
